title: Privacy Policy:
dis: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when visiting our website.
dis1: We may collect the following information:
li: Personal Information: Such as your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address when you register or contact us.
li1: Non-Personal Information: Such as browser type, operating system, IP address, and pages visited.
dis2: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
li21: To respond to your inquiries and requests.
li22: To send information about our products and services.
li23: To analyze data and improve our website.
dis3: We take appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, alteration, or destruction. These measures include:
dis4: We will not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties without your permission, except as required by law or to protect our rights.
dis5: We use cookies to enhance your experience on the website. You can set your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect your ability to use some features of the site.
li62: Request the deletion of your personal information in accordance with applicable laws.
dis7: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our website.
dis8: If you have any questions or inquiries regarding this privacy policy, please contact us via email or through the contact form available on our website.
